title: HPI Spencer
content: Jane Pollock reports doing well overall following her surgery. She experiences soreness and stiffness in her right upper extremity, with some bruising noted. She describes her pain as not too severe.

title: Musculoskeletal
content: Right upper extremity incisions are dry and intact with sutures. Moderate ecchymosis to the palm consistent with postoperative state. Middle and ring fingers held in flex position, limited fist formation about 4 cm from palm.

title: Assessment
content: Postoperative state of right upper extremity with ecchymosis

title: Plan
content: Return to clinic in one week for suture removal
